name: VR Pong
description:
VR Pong is an immersive pong cup simulator using realistic physics that allows you to feel the satisfaction of sinking that last cup!

- Explore unique and immersive environments
- Select unique table skins & customize your cup color
- Play against advanced AI to test your pong skills from Beginner to Expert levels
- Enjoy upbeat playlists at every stage
- Track your lifetime achievements and game statistics
